Package peregrine.client

Client API implementation which supports GET, SCAN, PUT, etc.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
Client Client which represents the functionality that each client must implement.
ClientRequest Framework required for clients.
ClientRuntime Client runtime necessary for running clients.
Connection Run a get request for the given keys.
GetClient Run a get request for the given keys.
GetRequest Represents a request to the server for GETing keys.
GetRequestURLDecoder Parse URLs into and from requests for use between the client and server.
GetRequestURLEncoder Encode GET request URLs.
RequestURLEncoder  
ScanClient Run a scan request for the given san request.
ScanRequest A scan basically represents an interval (in set theory) for requests.
ScanRequestURLDecoder Decode scan request URLs.
ScanRequestURLEncoder Parse out scan requests.
 

Package peregrine.client Description

Client API implementation which supports GET, SCAN, PUT, etc.
